meanings.definition: The act of worshiping or revering someone or something as an idol.
meanings.sent1: Her idolization of the famous singer was evident in the posters covering her walls.
meanings.sent2: The idolization of celebrities can sometimes lead to unrealistic expectations.
meanings.sent3: His idolization of his pet goldfish made his friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The idolization of wealth can blind people to the true value of life.
meanings.sent5: The idolization of superheroes in movies can inspire young children.

meanings.definition: Excessive admiration or devotion towards someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The young girl's idolization of her favorite teacher was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: Idolization of a sports team can bring fans together in unity.
meanings.sent3: His idolization of his morning coffee bordered on obsession.
meanings.sent4: The idolization of beauty standards can harm self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The idolization of historical figures can shape our understanding of the past.
